about.description:
After 23 years in Information Technology, I made a shift.

Driven by my passion for sport, fitness, and a healthy lifestyle, I became a certified Triathlon Instructor and Personal Fitness Coach. Alongside years of competing as an athlete in races and events around the world, I now dedicate myself to helping others as a personal coach.

I specialize in performance and rehabilitation coaching, empowering people to restore strength, confidence, and freedom in their daily lives.

  • I coach athletes preparing for multi-discipline events: from triathlons and Ironman races, to multi-day MTB events and marathons.
  • I guide athletes and non-athletes alike through the rehabilitation process, helping them recover from injury with strength training and mobility techniques.

My approach blends science-based training methods and performance monitoring tools with personal experience to help clients reach their goals.

Whether you’re training for your first (or next) competition, rebuilding after an injury, or simply looking to feel stronger and healthier. Let's connect.
